meanings.definition: The quality of being gentle or kind.
meanings.sent1: Her gentlenesses towards animals showed her caring nature.
meanings.sent2: The gentlenesses of the nurse comforted the patients in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: His gentlenesses were so evident that even the grumpy old man smiled.
meanings.sent4: The gentlenesses of the breeze on a warm day felt like a soft caress.
meanings.sent5: The gentlenesses of the teacher's words stayed with the students long after class.

meanings.definition: Acts of kindness or consideration towards others.
meanings.sent1: Small gentlenesses like holding the door open can make someone's day.
meanings.sent2: She showed her gentlenesses by helping the elderly lady cross the street.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gentlenesses of strangers can restore faith in humanity.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of noise, her gentlenesses spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The gentlenesses of the community came together to support those in need.
